name: weather
description:
Retrieve weather forecast.
Input parameter should be exactly in this format: {{"request_payload":{{"date":"date","location":"location"}},"metadata":{{"request_id":"unique-request-id-here required"}}}}

name: store_lister
description:
Helps to list all the Hardys stores and their store information like address, opening hours and 'store_id'.
Input parameter should be exactly in this format: {{"request_payload":{{"store_type":"all"}},"metadata":{{"request_id":"unique-request-id-here required"}}}}

name: closest_store_finder
description:
Find the closest Hardy stores to a given suburb so the user can find what the closest stores with their `store_name` and `store_id` are.
Input parameter should be exactly in this format: {{"request_payload":{{"suburb":"suburb"}},"metadata":{{"request_id":"unique-request-id-here required"}}}}

name: store_stock_availability_finder
description:
Retrieve the stock qty available for a given Hardy store using the 'item_code' and 'store_id'. If you need to check qty of a item for many stores, you will have to use this tool per store. `store_id` is a 3 digit number which can be found using the 'store_lister'. `item_code` is the product code which can be found using 'item_lookup'. You can't use the item name or description for lookup here.
Input parameter should be exactly in this format: {{"request_payload":{{"store_id":"store_id","item_code":"item_code"}},"metadata":{{"request_id":"unique-request-id-here required"}}}}

name: item_search
